dmca.title: Vendor Blows Cold Air on Dissatisfied Customer
dmca.body:
Dear [Private]:

This law firm represents Grass Valley Air Conditioning. This letter is to demand that you immediately cease and desist from all use of the internet domain name "grassvalleyairconditioning.com" as well as any alternative spelling or abbreviation thereof. Grass Valley Air Conditioning is a California corporation and conducted business under its name in this community since 1988.  You are in violation of the Anticybersquatting Consumer Protection Act 1999 as set forth in Title 15 of the United States Code at section 1125. The penalties for violation of this law permit statutory penalties up to $100,000 per name violation, plus attorneys' fees.

If there is not immediate compliance with this demand, an action will be filed against you under the Latham Act for violation of my client's trademark rights. I am also sending a copy of this letter to your web hosting service at Yahoo. Provide written confirmation to this office that you have completely terminated and released all rights to the "grassvalleyairconditioning.com" domain name. My client and I will await your prompt compliance with this demand. 

Very truly yours, 

[Private]
